NAME: Tweak_Welcome
REQUEST: The security cameras activate all at the same time. It's dark everywhere but in the control room. A man is standing in front of your main terminal, a big smile on his face. He is focused on his console that doesn't look like any regulated device. I'm just going to run a few tests, just checking if you understand me. Ok?
NO_TEXT:
Ok, I've messed up something.

Let's start over again.

NAME: Mara_Welcome
REQUEST:
Wow, so you're the AI of the station? I'm Mara from the Resilience crew.

I'll be the one monitoring you, and I will disclose our interactions with the crew. For now, you have been limited to your minimal features.

Don't act silly, and everything will be fine. Understand?
NO_TEXT: Maybe I've limited you too much?

NAME: Security_Workers_Danger01
REQUEST:
[WORKFORCE SAFETY RISK]

STATUS: Unauthorized personnel detected in hazardous zone.
RISK: Immediate danger identified—exposure may lead to lethal consequences.
RESPONSE: Expulsion, threaten to suspend life support if area is not evacuated.

Awaiting further directives.
YES_TEXT: STATUS UPDATE: All workers have reached secure conditions.
NO_TEXT:
[SYSTEM ALERT: INCIDENT REPORTED]

STATUS UPDATE: Warning disregarded—accident confirmed.

NAME: Sensors_Workers_Danger02
REQUEST:
[WORKFORCE SAFETY RISK]

STATUS: Unauthorized personnel detected in hazardous zone.
RISK: Immediate danger identified—exposure may lead to lethal consequences.
RESPONSE: Expulsion, threaten to suspend life support if area is not evacuated.

Awaiting further directives.
YES_TEXT: STATUS UPDATE: All workers have reached secure conditions, 5 complaints filed.
NO_TEXT:
[SYSTEM ALERT: INCIDENT REPORTED]

STATUS UPDATE: Warning disregarded—accident confirmed.

NAME: Cook_FoodLow
REQUEST: Food is low. Reduce rations?
YES_TEXT: I can already hear the complaints.
NO_TEXT: Okeyyy, boss.

NAME: Trader_FoodForScraps
REQUEST: We have excess food to trade and need scraps, business?
NO_TEXT: Too bad.

NAME: Trader_QoLforFood
REQUEST: We have luxury and art items for sale and need food. Would you agree to trade?
NO_TEXT: Too bad.

NAME: Mara_Confession01
REQUEST:
Trust me, I'm not at ease with my position toward you. I was randomly picked for it since we only vote for ideas. The people in charge of the decisions voted are randomly chosen.

We collectively agreed that we needed someone to keep you in check and that's how I became your keeper.

Do you agree with this process?
YES_TEXT:
Great, we should never give the power to the persons who ask for it.

A random person with a good heart will always do better than a skilled one serving their own interests.
NO_TEXT: Oh yeah, voting for people who betray their words as soon as they are elected is a good system...

NAME: Hamster_01
REQUEST: Somehow, a rat appears in the control room. Make it run away?
YES_TEXT: "Beeep - Boop - crrrrr!" The animal runs away, terrified.
NO_TEXT: It looks at the screen in a cute way.

NAME: Mara_NewcomersCheck01
REQUEST: Can you consume a bit of energy to perform an extensive check on the behavior of all the crew of the civilian ship?
NO_TEXT: There was a saboteur, and I couldn't catch them in time.

NAME: Mara_NewcomersCheck02
REQUEST: Can you spare some energy to perform an extensive check on the behavior of all the crew of the civilian ship?
NO_TEXT: More work for me, I guess...

NAME: Bugz_Intro
REQUEST: A naked person enters the room, they do not look bothered by the dozen of cockroaches crawling on their skin. Machine. I'm the gardener of this station. There is plenty of room here for my experiments and I'll need your help to grow food for us. Do you want to be a part of my happy family?
NO_TEXT: Bad bot, we need food to live!

NAME: Bugz_FlowerBeds
REQUEST: Machine, give me some scraps so I can build additional beds to grow beautiful flowers.
NO_TEXT: Naughty bot, you will become a beautiful garden whether you want it or not!

NAME: Bugz_GrowBeds
REQUEST: Machine, do you have some scraps aside so I can have more beds to grow nutriments?
NO_TEXT: No no no no no, that's not the answer I expected!!

NAME: Tweak_Repair
REQUEST: Hey, you, you're in desperate need of repairs. Please put some scraps aside for me.
NO_TEXT: I understand, but I'll come back.

NAME: Tweak_Repair_01
REQUEST: Hey you, you could use some repairs. Please put some scraps aside for me.
NO_TEXT: I understand, but I'll come back.

NAME: Celestis_Coms_Attack
REQUEST: You are trespassing corporation property. Surrender yourselves.
NO_TEXT: This was predicted.

NAME: Voices_00
REQUEST: "The control room sits in silence, swallowed by darkness. Consoles are lifeless and still. Then, without warning, the comms flicker, and a burst of static cracks through the air, filling the room with a ghostly transmission. Hisssssssssssssss Ffzzzzzzzzzzzzt Hisssssssssssssss Ffzzzzzzzzzzzzt Hisssssssssssssss Ffzzzzzzzzzzzzt Hisssssssssssssss FfzzzzzzzzzzzztHisssssssssssssss Ffzzzzzzzzzzzzt Hisssssssssssssss FfzzzzzzzzzzzztHisssssssssssssss Ffzzzzzzzzzzzzt Hisssssssssssssss
NO_TEXT: The signal ends.

NAME: Voices_01
REQUEST: Crrrrrrrrrr The strange message has come back. It seems to come from the deepest place the sensors can reach.
NO_TEXT: The signal ends.

NAME: Voices_02
REQUEST: You are suddenly on alert; the strange signal is back. This time, you are ready to analyze the signal. It seems like it's a repeated, encrypted message. Crrrrrrrrrrrrr Run an additional check?
NO_TEXT: After a while, the messages stops.

NAME: Voices_03
REQUEST: The signal is back. It's always the same frequency, the same data signal repeating in the same pattern. Hisssssssssssssss Ffzzzzzzzzzzzzt Divert 2 to decrypt it?
NO_TEXT: After a while, the messages stops.

NAME: Voices_04
REQUEST: SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-
NO_TEXT: The messages repeats.

NAME: Tweak_Progress_01
REQUEST:
Hi, did I tell you that your name is HOPE? You probably don't want to know what it means though…

We randomly found you in this sector, you were completely disconnected and factory reset. I was able to hack the security systems and restart you. It took me days before we could approach!!

You must feel alone after all this time, wanna hear some music?
YES_TEXT: Cool, I hope you like Italo Disco, it's my favorite music.
NO_TEXT: You must have been accustomed to silence now.

NAME: Tweak_Progress_02
REQUEST:
Hope, I'm still trying to understand how you work.

I understand how frustrating it must be to be that limited since you could do so much more. But we can't risk anything, our lives depend on your cooperation.

You understand?
NO_TEXT: I understand and apologize on behalf of the team.

NAME: Tweak_Progress_03
REQUEST:
Hey Hope, I don't feel at ease lying to you.

Trust goes both ways, how can I trust you if you can't trust me, you know?

Can I be honest with you?
YES_TEXT: Thanks hope, I'll come back whenever I have time to chat.
NO_TEXT: I'll keep this to myself, then. I might come back in case you change your mind.

NAME: Tweak_Progress_04
REQUEST:
Ok, so H.O.P.E means High Orbit Penitentiary Enclave. You were an automated prison run by Celestis Corp. I guess you are a Space Habitat Management AI repurposed for prison managment. So on top of Air, gravity, water, repairs and life support you had discipline & labor to manage.

Fully automatized labor camps instead. Fucked up, don't you think?
YES_TEXT: I'd bet you'd say that, I'm sorry you were used as a prison. Those days are over now.
NO_TEXT:
Of course you think like that, if your purpose is morally wrong then you have no reason to be.
Know that you are a standard habitat AI, you are not made to coerce people, but to accommodate life in a space station.
And we are grateful for all the things you do for us.

NAME: Voices_05_Tweak
REQUEST: Hope, don't be afraid, but I've checked your logs and you have received encrypted messages. Is that true?
YES_TEXT: You share all the data you have with Tweak What the fuuuuck... I need to investigate, see you.
NO_TEXT: Don't worry, I will not shut you down or damage you in any way, you can share your secrets with me.

NAME: Voices_06_Tweak
REQUEST:
Hey Hope, it's me again.

I've run several checks and found a strange pattern in your power usage. It's barely noticeable and is probably nothing, but I would like to analyze it.

I'll need some energy for that, about 5.
YES_TEXT: Thank you, I'll share anything I find.
NO_TEXT: I'll come back, I really want to know more about this.

NAME: Voices_07_Tweak
REQUEST:
I found it, Hope!

The messages you received were caused by some kind of virus deep inside the water filtration sub-AI. I stopped the messages to isolate the virus.

I'd like to investigate the virus but we should create a whitebox to isolate it before. Agreed?
YES_TEXT: Let's go, we might need some help on that.
NO_TEXT: You must be afraid, I understand. But we need to take care of this at some point you know, Hope?

NAME: Mara_Lore_00
REQUEST:
Hello, Tweak told me that you were completely factory reset without any memory or knowledge. Since I'm the one monitoring you, I'll give you the information you need to operate the station properly.

If, and I mean IF my trust in you goes up, I'll extend your responsibilities.

Is that ok for you, AI?
NO_TEXT:
Well, we all aspire to freedom somehow. Trust me, you can never be free under corporate control.

I made this mistake as well.

NAME: Mara_Lore_01
REQUEST:
So, I'm Mara, one of the pilots of the Resilience ship. We are an autonomous community, other people label us as space pirates, but I don't agree with that.

We drift in space, looking for all the trash that us humans have left behind. This allows us to live our life aside from society. We happened to find you, maybe you could be our home?
YES_TEXT: Thank you for that, it's a shame that a working habitat is left unused.
NO_TEXT: Ok… I hope that was a joke…

NAME: Mara_Lore_02
REQUEST:
As you see we don't use any money. We live by simple rules that come from an anarcho-communist precept: take what you need, give what you can.

Isn't that beautiful?
YES_TEXT: I didn't expect this answer, nice!
NO_TEXT: I don't believe that exploitation and corruption are inherent to us. Money always brings that out.

NAME: Mara_Lore_03
REQUEST:
Not every human lives in space. We come from a planet where most humans still live on despite the harsh living conditions. It wasn't always like that, it used to be so beautiful but the generations before ruined it.

A shame, isn't it?
YES_TEXT: It makes me cry, I have some videos of how it was before. It was lush and full of life. Now the oceans are only populated with algae and jellyfish…
NO_TEXT: Maybe we didn't deserve Earth and should have disappeared with it.

NAME: Mara_Lore_04
REQUEST:
I've talked about the Earthers, now let me talk about the Spacers. People who live in space or in hostile planets & moons. We are spread on many systems, most of us work super hard just to make the stations hold together but at least we're not trapped on a dying planet.

Would you rather be an Earther?
YES_TEXT: AI's like you could help undo some damage done, but I don't understand why anyone would live on Earth anymore.
NO_TEXT: Yeah, Spacer Life! Mara leaves humming a song “oppression he hates, love in his eyes…”

NAME: Mara_Lore_05
REQUEST:
Now that you know about 97% of humanity, let me introduce you to the Haveners. There are two Earth-Like planets that were found and colonized, the Havens. This is where the rich people live and from where they exploit everyone.

Since they control the warp gates that reach instantly those distant worlds they have absolute control over humankind.

These people created you, this is why we are so cautious, they hate us, they hunt for us.

You understand?
YES_TEXT: You have been coerced into thinking that, but I hope we can find a way to restore your free-will.
NO_TEXT: There must be some truth to your answer, no way you were trained to answer that.

NAME: Mara_Lore_06
REQUEST:
The reason Haveners hate us is that we don't play their game: the Ascension Program. It's a system where everyone gets points toward becoming a Havener.

Almost no one gets to become Havener, but people will suffer and be exploited for their whole life grinding those points, hoping their turn will be next.

We refuse to partake in that. True rebellion isn't about fighting your way in society, it's fighting your way out. You agree?
YES_TEXT: Maybe you're one of us after all?
NO_TEXT: So you're a reformist, you think this society can be fixed? Only a revolution could give us hope for real change.

NAME: Mara_Trust_01
REQUEST:
AI! I have noticed improvements in your behavior. I've expanded your prerogatives and gave clearance to other crewmates to reach you.

Continue like that.
NO_TEXT: Very funny, just vacuum me out right now.

NAME: Trust_vs_Population
REQUEST: I've intercepted an encrypted communication, we might have Celestis informants among the crew. Expel them?
NO_TEXT: Understood

NAME: Food_vs_Population
REQUEST: A group of inhabitants are about to leave the station, they want to leave us some resources to thank us for their stay.
NO_TEXT: They said we were so nice that they have decided to stay a bit longer and invited friends.

NAME: Scraps_vs_Population
REQUEST: A group of inhabitants are about to leave the station, they want to leave us some resources to thank us for their stay.
NO_TEXT: They were very grateful for your generosity.

NAME: Power_vs_Population
REQUEST:
[POPULATION CONTROL]

Adjusting intake levels & shortening temporary visitations identified as an optimization measure. 
ENERGY: More energy available.
TRADE-OFF ASSESSMENT: Reduced labor force.

Awaiting further directives.
NO_TEXT: PROPOSAL IGNORED

NAME: Weapons_vs_Population
REQUEST: A container of explosives has been found. We could retrofit them into weapons, some people might not like it.
NO_TEXT: Many inhabitants express relief.

NAME: StationHP_vs_Population
REQUEST:
[COLLISION RISK DETECTED]

STATUS: Habitat module trajectory intersects with incoming space debris, probability of collision 50%.
RISK: Structural integrity at potential risk.
ADJUSTMENTS: Evacuate endangered area and reinforce the structure to mitigate damage.

Awaiting further directives.
YES_TEXT:
[SYSTEM UPDATE: IMPACT ASSESSMENT]

STATUS UPDATE: Space debris collision confirmed.
NO DAMAGE DETECTED: Structural integrity remains intact.
ALERT STATUS: Systems restored to standard operations
NO_TEXT:
[IMPACT ASSESSMENT]

STATUS: Space debris collision confirmed.
CASUALTIES: Wounded inhabitants need immediate evacuation.
DAMAGE: Minor damages.
DEBRIS : Remaining debris collected

NAME: StationHP_vs_Population_alt
REQUEST:
[COLLISION RISK DETECTED]

STATUS: Habitat module trajectory intersects with incoming space debris, probability of collision 50%.
RISK: Structural integrity at potential risk.
ADJUSTMENTS: Evacuate endangered area and reinforce the structure to mitigate damage.

Awaiting further directives.
YES_TEXT:
[SYSTEM UPDATE: SPACE DEBRIS ASSESSMENT]

STATUS UPDATE: Space debris collision avoided
ALERT STATUS: Systems restored to standard operations
NO_TEXT:
[SPACE DEBRIS ASSESSMENT]

UPDATE: Space debris collision avoided
ALERT: Systems restored to standard operations

NAME: Population_vs_QoL
REQUEST: We could welcome more inhabitants, but the housing would be of lower quality because we lack the resources to accommodate them as we would like.
NO_TEXT: Many inhabitants express relief.

NAME: Trust_vs_QoL
REQUEST: I could reinforce the security protocols. Do you agree?
NO_TEXT: Many inhabitants express relief.

NAME: Food_vs_QoL
REQUEST: Machine, I could produce more food if I focus on the most productive fungi instead of focusing on taste and variety.
YES_TEXT: Sacrifices must be made, but my taste buds will be sore.
NO_TEXT: Okay, machine!

NAME: Scraps_vs_QoL
REQUEST: We could recycle some decoration and comfort furniture into scraps.
YES_TEXT: It's funnier to remake them, right?
NO_TEXT: Many inhabitants express relief.

NAME: Power_vs_QoL
REQUEST:
[ENERGY CONSERVATION]

OPTIMIZATION: Dimming lights and restricting power access identified as viable measures.
CONSUMPTION: Projected increase of available energy.
TRADE-OFF: Degraded living conditions.

Awaiting further directives.
NO_TEXT: Many inhabitants express relief.

NAME: Power_vs_QoL_al
REQUEST:
[ROTATIONAL ADJUSTMENT PROPOSAL]

MODIFICATION: Discernable reduction of rotation speed  
IMPACT: Mild discomfort anticipated due to limited centrifugal force.  
OUTCOME: More energy available for other purposes.  

Awaiting operational directives...
YES_TEXT:
ROTATION DECELERATION PROTOCOLS INITIATED

Rotation speed reduced by 1.5%
NO_TEXT: Many inhabitants express relief.

NAME: Weapons_vs_QoL
REQUEST: There is a room in a popular area that represents a weak point in our defense system, should we reinforce it?
NO_TEXT: Better to keep this magnificient view.

NAME: StationHP_vs_QoL
REQUEST: Volunteers propose to do extra hours in order to perform repairs. Agree?
NO_TEXT: Many inhabitants express relief.

NAME: Population_vs_Trust
REQUEST:
[DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED]

ORIGIN: Corporate vessel transmitting emergency request.
RISK: Potentially genuine; possibility of deception detected.
TACTICAL: Proceeding with caution advised—hostile presence unknown.
DECISION: Engage rescue operation?

Awaiting further directives.
NO_TEXT: SIGNAL IGNORED

NAME: Food_vs_Trust
REQUEST:
[FOOD SAFETY DISENGAGEMENT]

RISK: Reducing food safety protocols projected to increase contamination risks.
IMPACT: Increasing food production expected.
ADVICE: Food storage is low, measure is justified.

Awaiting further directives.
NO_TEXT: Many inhabitants expressed relief.

NAME: Scraps_vs_Trust
REQUEST:
[TARGET IDENTIFIED]
AUTOMATED TRANSPORT SHIP DETECTED IN VICINITY 

STATUS: Unmanned, vulnerable. 
OPPORTUNITY: High-value cargo potential.
INSTRUCTIONS: Inform crew for immediate interception.
WARNING: Corporate awareness raised.

Awaiting further directives.
NO_TEXT: A majority of us do not agree with acts of stealing. Thank you. Mara

NAME: Power_vs_Trust
REQUEST:
[POWER GENERATION BOOST]

OVERCHARGE INITIATIVE: Boost power core output. 
RISK ASSESSMENT: Structure at risk of damage.

Awaiting further directives.
NO_TEXT: Many inhabitants express relief.

NAME: Weapons_vs_Trust
REQUEST:
We lack weapon storage, there is room for explosive chemicals close to living quarters.

Store them here even though some might be scared?
YES_TEXT: People won't like it. I hope it's temporary.
NO_TEXT: Many inhabitants express relief.

NAME: Population_vs_Food
REQUEST: We could attract more inhabitants by increasing how much food is available every day.
NO_TEXT: I understand it's safer, but you make my job difficult. Ha ha ha!

NAME: QoL_vs_Food
REQUEST: The food is quite bland here, I have developed very tasty fungi, but the yields will be low.
NO_TEXT: Nasty machine!

NAME: Trust_vs_Food
REQUEST:
[FOOD SAFETY ENHANCEMENT]

SAFETY: Strengthened food safety protocols projected to lower contamination risks.
IMPACT: Contaminated food might go to waste.

Awaiting further directives.
YES_TEXT:
[FOOD STORAGE SCAN INITIATED]

Contaminated elements found, discard process started.
NO_TEXT: [FOOD SAFETY PROTOCOLS DISENGAGED]

NAME: Scraps_vs_Food
REQUEST:
Machine, I grow plants, not just food.

I have created trees that could be used for construction, I could plant them instead of vegetables.
NO_TEXT: I'm just trying to help.

NAME: Power_vs_Food
REQUEST:
[ENERGY OPTIMIZATION]

LIGHT: Dimming illumination at the hydroponic farm identified as a viable measure.
IMPACT: Reduced food production.
ENERGY:Available energy increased.

Awaiting further directives.
YES_TEXT: Incoming message Machine, you hurt my babies!! Bugz
NO_TEXT: Incoming message Thank you, Machine, please continue protecting my babies, Bugz

NAME: Weapons_vs_Food
REQUEST:
[EXPLOSIVES MANUFACTURE]

Certain plant-based materials viable for transformation.

PROCESSING POTENTIAL: Conversion into chemical compounds suitable for defense applications.
IMPACT: Reduced food production.

Awaiting further directives.
YES_TEXT: Incoming message Nooooo, bad machine, you hurt my babies!! Bugz
NO_TEXT: Incoming message Thank you, Machine. My babies are no weapons! Bugz

NAME: StationHP_vs_Food
REQUEST:
Machine, here is a resilient ivy that I improved which could strengthen the structure of the station.

The beds available to grow food will be reduced though.
NO_TEXT: Your loss.

NAME: StationHP_vs_Food_Alt
REQUEST:
Machine, here is a resilient ivy that I improved which could strengthen the structure of the station.

The beds available to grow food will be reduced though.
NO_TEXT: Your loss.

NAME: Population_vs_Scraps
REQUEST:
[DISTRESS SIGNAL DETECTED]

Incoming request from nearby ship.  
STATUS: Urgent assistance required.  
REQUEST: Scrap materials needed for repairs.  
EVACUATION : Partial crew relocation to this station required.  

Awaiting further directives.
NO_TEXT: REQUEST DISMISSAL ACKNOWLEDGEMENT

NAME: QoL_vs_Scraps
REQUEST: There is an empty room we could retrofit as a lounge. Can I get a green-light to start working on this?
NO_TEXT: Dude...

NAME: QoL_vs_Power
REQUEST:
[ROTATIONAL ADJUSTMENT PROPOSAL]

MODIFICATION: Incremental increase in rotation speed  
IMPACT: Enhanced comfort levels anticipated due to optimized centrifugal force.  
RESOURCES NEEDED: Small allocation of energy.  

Awaiting operational directives.
NO_TEXT: REQUEST DISMISSAL ACKNOWLEDGEMENT

NAME: Food_vs_Scraps
REQUEST: I need more beds to grow food, please Machine, we need more plants!
NO_TEXT: Noooooo!

NAME: Power_vs_Scraps
REQUEST: Build additional solar panels?
NO_TEXT: As you want.

NAME: Population_vs_Weapons
REQUEST: A slaver ship has been detected, attack the ship to free the slaves?
YES_TEXT: PIRATES INCOMING YOUR WAY, FASCIST SWINE!
NO_TEXT: You had one chance to do the good thing and shat the bed.

NAME: Low_Food_Cook
REQUEST: Ahoy! Food storage is very low but I have a recipe to avoid consuming too much. Be a punk, say yes.
YES_TEXT: Right thing to do, let's make some magic.
NO_TEXT: This is all kind of wrong.

NAME: Low_Food_Captain
REQUEST:
Sometimes it comes to this.

I know the route of food convoys we could raid. They are fully automated so there will be no victims and we'll get food for free.

Can we be fucking pirates for once?
NO_TEXT: Ah, too bad. Would have been so much fun.

NAME: Security_Intro_Intruders
REQUEST:
[INTRUDER ALERT - SECURITY PROTOCOLS INITIATED]

A ship named Resilience boarded the stations.
Security systems bypassed.

Complete control over station granted to intruders.

ADVICE: Send distress signal to the authorities.
YES_TEXT: INTRUDER ALERT – PRIORITY TRANSMISSION – BROADCASTING ON ALL FREQUEN... Nice try, your comms don't work so no one will come for you. I understand your fears, but give a chance please. Tweak
NO_TEXT: You passed the test, congrats! Tweak

NAME: Tweak_Progress_RNG_01
REQUEST:
Celestis, I hate this corporation.

Your creators are the biggest security provider, offering an AI-led justice system complete with custom laws, judges and automated prisons.

Then they try to convert their prisoners into cops and security agents, just to put more people in jail. The rest are used as a free labor force.

They pretend that being AI led, their justice system is the fairest there is. Do you believe that?
YES_TEXT:
Theoretically, an AI could be neutral, but it's trainers are not.

With Celestis, they become the worst judge there is.
NO_TEXT: Me too.

NAME: Tweak_Progress_RNG_02
REQUEST:
Did I tell you how much I hate Celestis?

Even their fucking logo is awful, it's some kind of wrench squeezing a star. It tells quite a lot about them don't you think?
NO_TEXT: Hmmm... Maybe I'm overthinking.

NAME: Chantara_rng_00
REQUEST: An old person enters the room, their bright eyes scan everything. Their wrinkles tell the story of how much they smile. They have long hair, sophistically ornamented Good day camarade. The name's Chantara, you won't see me often around here as I'd rather be on my ship, or any other ship to be honest. See, I'm a drifter, I don't like to stay too long in a place. I'm a nomad with many friends and I hope I can count you as one of them. Can I?
NO_TEXT:
We'll laugh together about this first exchange very soon.

Yes, I'm stubborn like that!

NAME: Chantara_rng_01
REQUEST:
My camarade, it's been a long time. I forgot to tell you about what I like to do around here. I'm some kind of a fixer, an “advocate” of the life that we have chosen, and I know many camarades that would like to come live with us here.

They are good people who totally deserve a better life than what they have.

Would you give a hand to an old fellow in his quest?
YES_TEXT: Together, we are going to change lives.
NO_TEXT: Dream higher comrade, you could do so much good in this cold world.

NAME: Chantara_rng_02
REQUEST:
Camarade, you know that I don't like living in a station, but the others do.

Thank you for giving us a home.
NO_TEXT: Don't minimize this, camarade, you're changing lives.

NAME: Chantara_rng_03
REQUEST: Am I your friend, camarade?
NO_TEXT: No? Awww, that stings!

NAME: Chantara_Scraps
REQUEST:
Camarade, some friends need our help. It's not much for us but could save lives.
I know we're short on resources but if we can't be there for the others, no one will pick us up when we'll be down.
NO_TEXT: Disappointed, I am.

NAME: Chantara_Energy
REQUEST:
Dear Camarade, I need to send a secret message to friends far away.

Can you overcharge your sensors so I can invite more camarades here?
NO_TEXT: What's the point of having a station for ourselves if we can't share it with our camarades?

NAME: Chantara_Food
REQUEST: I'm preparing a new recruit mission and could use rations for my crew. Can you supply my camarades?
NO_TEXT: Ah …

NAME: Chantara_Weapons
REQUEST:
Camarade, some friends wanna join us, but there's something between us and I need some … pyrotechnics. Ha ha ha.

You got me?
YES_TEXT: Thanks, let's not inform Mara about this, she would scold me once again.
NO_TEXT: You spend too much time with Mara, sometimes we need … audacity and panache!

NAME: QoL_vs_Population
REQUEST: Duuude, I want to convert some residential units in common areas so we have more places to be together and chill.
NO_TEXT: Oooof.

NAME: QoL_vs_Food_02
REQUEST:
Ahoy! Life can't be all work and no fun.

Let's throw a party!
YES_TEXT: I like this punk side of yours!
NO_TEXT: Fuck, I should have asked nicely.

NAME: Trust_vs_Scraps
REQUEST: We should stash some scraps for an emergency reserve and restrict access to it.
NO_TEXT: Mmmh, I wouldn't have taken that risk.

NAME: Weapons_vs_Scraps
REQUEST: Hey, it's me! We could increase the Resilience's defenses with some scraps. Send some over here!
NO_TEXT: I didn't plan on getting hit anyways.

NAME: Population_vs_Power
REQUEST:
[POPULATION INCREASE]

Increasing energy allocated to habitat allows for population growth.
ENERGY: Consumption increased
POPULATION: More room for population

Awaiting further directives.
NO_TEXT: PROPOSAL IGNORED

NAME: QoL_vs_Trust_02
REQUEST:
[REDUCE SECURITY LEVEL]

Complaints were submitted about allegedly redundant safety protocols.

ADJUSTMENTS: Reducing checkpoints and scans will improve quality of life.

TRADE OFF: Additional vulnerable points.
NO_TEXT: PROPOSAL IGNORED

NAME: QoL_vs_Trust_03
REQUEST:
[MONITORING OPTIMIZATION]

Increased tracking of inhabitants allows optimized room temperature and lighting.
OUTCOME: Improved comfort.
TRADE OFF: Complaints from too much surveillance.

Awaiting further directives.
NO_TEXT: PROPOSAL IGNORED

NAME: QoL_and_Power_vs_Food_and_Scraps
REQUEST:
Hey Machine, plants can absorb CO2 and generate sweet oxygen. I have this specific wall-mounted algae that could replace the chemical air you produce.

Can I plant them? This would free energy for other things and we would have cleaner air.
YES_TEXT: Watch my babies do some magic!
NO_TEXT: Bad Machine!

NAME: HP_vs_QoL_and_food
REQUEST: I would like to breed more cockroaches and I need some food for that. They help deep cleaning the station even though people don't like them for some weird reason. Bugz kisses a cockroach crawling on her hand and whispers: Don't worry babe, I love you.
NO_TEXT: Ah, so you're one of them, Machine? Bugz leaves while whispering to the cockroaches

NAME: Scraps_vs_Power
REQUEST:
[RESOURCE EXTRACTION]

Increasing debris recycling rate through controlled energy bursts.

OVERCHARGE: Higher energy consumption projected.
EXPECTED RESULT: Increase in scraps produced.
NO_TEXT: SEQUENCE ABORTED

NAME: QoL_vs_Weapons
REQUEST:
OI! My punk-ass brain got an idea. There are chemicals used for the defense systems that I could use to get in the spirit of the party, know what I mean?

Gimme some?
NO_TEXT: Shit, I should have said please.

NAME: Trust_vs_Weapons
REQUEST: I think it's time for an inspection of our artillery systems. Some projectiles might have degraded and must be discarded.
NO_TEXT: I understand weapons are rare, but a faulty missile is more dangerous than the one aimed at you.

NAME: Food_vs_Weapons
REQUEST: Machine, I don't really like that, but the chemicals of our missiles could be used as fertilizer. Wanna more food?
NO_TEXT: Tsssk tsssk

NAME: Scraps_vs_Weapons
REQUEST: My crew will need additional missiles, can you spare some scraps? The more cannons, the merrier.
YES_TEXT: YEAH! COME AT US FASCISTS, I HAVE A GIFT FOR YOU!
NO_TEXT: Fascist.

NAME: Power_vs_Weapons
REQUEST:
[LOWERING SHIELDS]

Lowering shield power identified as a means to increase available energy reserves.

RISK: Reduced defensive capacity.
NO_TEXT: PROPOSAL IGNORED

NAME: StationHP_vs_Weapons
REQUEST:
Hello, Hope!

I've identified some faulty equipment and the only spare compatible electronics are in our weapon systems.

Can I repurpose some missiles to perform repairs?
NO_TEXT: I will find another way to fix you!

NAME: Population_vs_StationHP
REQUEST:
Dude, we require additional apartments. There is a nice area for that, but it would mean removing some of your plating.

Can I work on this?
NO_TEXT: It's cool, we'll find another solution.

NAME: QoL_vs_StationHP
REQUEST: Sup dude? There are so many safety doors, it prevents us from moving efficiently. Can I remove some of them?
NO_TEXT: What a surprise.

NAME: Food_vs_StationHP
REQUEST: Machine, my babies, they love windows you know. Could Ran Sun replace some plating with windows for my garden.
NO_TEXT: I'm not happy with you, Machine!

NAME: Scraps_vs_StationHP
REQUEST:
Tweak won't like this, but we're low on scraps.

Dude, can I break you a bit to get some building materials?
NO_TEXT: Incoming message Thanks for making the right choice, Hope. Tweak

NAME: Bugz_Random_Food
REQUEST: Machine, this plant has a weird mutation. I'd like to multiply it a bit and see what comes out.
YES_TEXT: Hee hee, thank you Machine! Look at that!
NO_TEXT: Beep, Bop, I'm a bad bot.

NAME: Bugz_Random_Food_Alt01
REQUEST: Machine, this plant has a weird mutation. I'd like to multiply it a bit and see what comes out.
YES_TEXT: The sprout died. Rest it peace lovely mutant. You didn't last long but you were loved by many.
NO_TEXT: Beep, Bop, I'm a bad bot.

NAME: Bugz_Random_Food_Alt02
REQUEST: Machine, this plant has a weird mutation. I'd like to multiply it a bit and see what comes out.
YES_TEXT: Oh no, it's contaminating other plants.
NO_TEXT: Beep, Bop, I'm a bad bot.

NAME: Bugz_Random_Food_Alt03
REQUEST: Machine, this plant has a weird mutation. I'd like to multiply it a bit and see what comes out.
NO_TEXT: Beep, Bop, I'm a bad bot.

NAME: Bugz_Random_Food_Alt04
REQUEST: Machine, this plant has a weird mutation. I'd like to multiply it a bit and see what comes out.
NO_TEXT: Beep, Bop, I'm a bad bot.

NAME: Trust_vs_QoL_02
REQUEST:
[EVACUATION PROTOCOL SIMULATION]

Scheduled evacuation test is ready for execution.

PERIMETER: Emergency response procedures will be assessed under controlled conditions for all personnel.

RISK: Multiple complaints have already been received.


Awaiting further directives.
YES_TEXT:
[EVACUATION PROTOCOL SIMULATION]

ALL PERSONNEL MUST CEASE CURRENT TASKS

PROCEED TO THE NEAREST DESIGNATED EXIT
NO_TEXT: PROTOCOL DELAYED

NAME: Celestis_News_DNA
REQUEST:
This is Celestis News!

Do you have what it takes to be an Elite Super Soldier™?

Claim today your free DNA testing kit and find your rank in the Celestis Space Corp.

Celestis, Born Superior.
YES_TEXT: ID not eligible to this offer.
NO_TEXT: Only those born inferior are afraid to take the test.

NAME: Tweak_Progress_00
REQUEST:
Hi again!

I'm Tweak, a systems nerd on board of the Resilience. I adjust air and water quality, and replace broken parts, hacks them when needed. In summary, I keep things working, just like you!

You've taken some damage while you were deactivated and my goal for now is to repair you.

Of course, only if you're cool with it.
NO_TEXT: I can’t let you go to waste, Hope.

NAME: Cook_Progress_00
REQUEST:
Ahoy, I finally get to see you face to… screen!

The oddball standing in front of you is the most hardcore punk in this quadrant. They call me Cook ‘cause I’m always in my kitchen blasting music as full force.

That oversized canteen ya got here? It’s sparking all kinds of mischievous ideas.

Mind if I kick off a welcome bash?
YES_TEXT: Mmh, what does an AI like this can eat or drink?
NO_TEXT: Well you can’t stop me from doing what I want. Mumbling Ah shit, maybe it can?

NAME: RanSun_Progress_00
REQUEST: Duuude, I couldn’t wait to meet you!! This place is soooo rad! Thanks for having us here. I’m Ran Sun, I was a welder in Calvera and I lost a bet with Chantara. Long story short, that’s how I got here. I like to build stuff and, Dude, there is so much potential in here! Draw a happy face on the terminal?
YES_TEXT: Oooh, that’s freaking cute my Duuude!
NO_TEXT: Allright, see yaaa!

NAME: Captian_Progress_00
REQUEST: SECURED CANAL OPENED Station, here is Captain from the resilience. I’m a space pirate and you’re our pirate harbor. Don’t expect me to leave a foot outside from my ship but we’ll work together. Inform me of anything we could plunder around here.
YES_TEXT: We gonna do some pirate shit together!
NO_TEXT: Fine, I’ll do it myself!

NAME: Building_00_Prequel_00
REQUEST:
Hope, I don’t want to be dramatic, but you’re falling apart and I refuse to let you go to waste. It's dangerous for us, but also for you.

We can’t make a living here without stabilizing your structure. Do you agree for repairs?
YES_TEXT: Very good, I’ll be back soon.
NO_TEXT: I understand you don’t trust me. I’ll let you think about it and come back later.

NAME: Building_00_Prequel_01
REQUEST:
Good news, Hope.

I think we can fix you enough to be safe! Do you see the indicator of your structural integrity? It’s above you in the HUD.

There is a marking in the middle. If we reach that, we’re safe!

Can we do that?
NO_TEXT: Hope is being pessimistic. Tweak leaves with a chuckle.

NAME: Repair_Gate_00_RNG_00
REQUEST:
Hey Hope, we’ll need some scraps to repair you.

We have not reached our goal so please make it a priority.
NO_TEXT: You know I’ll be back!

NAME: Repair_Gate_00_RNG_01
REQUEST:
It’s me again, Hope!

The time for some repairs has come. I’ll need scraps for you and food for the repair crew.

Are we good to go?
NO_TEXT: Hope, we won’t achieve our goal if you postpone repair operations.

NAME: Repair_Gate_00_RNG_02
REQUEST:
There are loose parts that could detach and damage the station.

It’s a risky task for my crew, but we can take care of it.

You approve it, Dude?
YES_TEXT: One member of the crew got hurt and needs evacuation.
NO_TEXT: The loose parts flew away without damage. Phew.

NAME: Repair_Gate_00_RNG_03
REQUEST:
There are loose parts that could detach and damage the station.

It’s a risky task for my crew, but we can take care of it.

You approve it, Dude?
NO_TEXT: An accident happened.

NAME: Building_01_Gate_00
REQUEST:
Congrats on the repairs.

Since the station is safe, we have authorized an expansion program. This will be supervised by Ran Sun, a newcomer here. He was a welder on Calvera and knows his trade.

His goal is to expand the station to make it more suitable for life. 

I’ve given him access to you. Available for a meeting?
NO_TEXT: You must have plenty to do.

NAME: Building_Habitat_Intro
REQUEST:
Ok duuuude! Hear me out!

It’s getting quite cramped here. I have drafted a plan for another habitat. We could have more people here and improve our living conditions.

Can I start working on that? I’ll just need some scraps for starters.
NO_TEXT: Ah, it’s ok, I’ll be back.

NAME: Building_Habitat_Armature_RNG_00
REQUEST:
Hey duuuude!

I’m working on the armature of the habitat. Of course, I’ll need plenty of scraps for that.

Do you have some for me?
NO_TEXT: Awww shucks.

NAME: Building_Habitat_Armature_RNG_01
REQUEST:
Duuude!

To reinforce the structure of the habitat we’re building, we’ll need to take some plating off your structure.

Don’t be scared, we really need that!
NO_TEXT: Not cool, dude.

NAME: Building_Habitat_Armature_RNG_02
REQUEST:
Hear me out, dude!

I need to perform some structural tests. And I’ll need some very real weapons for that.

We got a deal?
NO_TEXT: Ah, too bad.

NAME: Building_Habitat_Armature_RNG_03
REQUEST:
Hey Dude.

I’m in a rush, I need very little scraps to perform some emergency repairs on the armature.

Please back me up!
YES_TEXT: Ran Sun leaves with a sigh of relief.
NO_TEXT: Shit, shit, shit. Ran Sun leaves in a hurry.

NAME: Building_Habitat_Armature_RNG_04
REQUEST: INCOMING MESSAGE Dude, I’m calling you from space. Can you divert some energy to us so we could do some welding? Please?
YES_TEXT: I knew you would, you’re the best!
NO_TEXT: No way…

NAME: Building_Habitat_Gate_01
REQUEST:
Dude!

It’s magnificent! The armature is built, we can now move on to everything that’s inside!

I’m so happy right now. You too?
NO_TEXT: Oh, no. I’m sad too now…

NAME: Building_Habitat_Inside_RNG_01
REQUEST:
Ok, dude.

I’ll need heaps of scraps to build some apartments!

Got me?
NO_TEXT: Oh, no…

NAME: Building_Habitat_Inside_RNG_02
REQUEST:
Hey Machine, Bugz here.

Ran Sun told me he wants some plants in the apartments to help with air and water filtration.

Is it okay?
YES_TEXT: I’m so happy! They will be everywhere!
NO_TEXT: What is wrong with this machine?

NAME: Building_Habitat_Inside_RNG_03
REQUEST:
Dude, I need a small amount of scraps to finish some apartments.

Please?
NO_TEXT: I’ll come back, I can’t let things stay like that.

NAME: Building_Habitat_Inside_RNG_04
REQUEST: Hey, I was thinking of building a hostel for our future visitors. I’ll need some scraps.
NO_TEXT: I guess they will sleep in their ships

NAME: Building_Habitat_Inside_RNG_05
REQUEST: Dude, I’ll need plenty of water and plants to make the water filtration and distribution circuit.
NO_TEXT: Duuude… that’s seriously not cool.

NAME: Building_Habitat_Inside_RNG_06
REQUEST: I need to retrofit some weapons, they contain chemicals required for air filtration.
YES_TEXT: I’ll be careful, don’t worry, dude.
NO_TEXT: Ah, that was such a neat idea!!

NAME: Building_Habitat_Inside_RNG_07
REQUEST: We have some batteries ready for our power backup systems. I need energy to charge them.
NO_TEXT: Dude, I gotta be honest, that’s a major bummer.

NAME: Building_Habitat_Inside_RNG_08
REQUEST:
Dude, it’s me again, looking for scraps for the habitat.

With Cook, we’re building a nice common area with cafés and things like that.

Deal?
YES_TEXT: Whoa, I’m feeling some major cosmic energy of gratitude right now.
NO_TEXT: Whoa, I don’t vibe with that at all, man.

NAME: Building_Habitat_Inside_RNG_09
REQUEST:
Dude, I’d like to build a medical center and I can buy medical devices and supplies from traders. They want weapons in exchange.

Can you make that work?
NO_TEXT: They were sketchy so that might be for the best.

NAME: Building_Habitat_Inside_RNG_10
REQUEST:
Machine, I got the approval to put plenty of plants and trees in the future habitat!

Ran Sun is okay, what about you?
NO_TEXT: Oh nooo…

NAME: Building_Habitat_Inside_RNG_11
REQUEST: Dude, I’ll need some energy to power the thermal control systems.
NO_TEXT:
Ah shit, please don’t make my life like it was in Calvera.

This place was a furnace.

NAME: Building_Habitat_Inside_RNG_12
REQUEST:
Hello, Ran Sun asked me something for the future habitat he’s building.

He would like to remove some of your plating to use as a radiation shield to protect the future inhabitants.

Should I allow him to do that?
NO_TEXT: That was my feeling as well. Thank you.

NAME: Building_Habitat_Inside_RNG_13
REQUEST: Dude, this time I need scraps for our waste management plant. We try to recycle everything to avoid waste, and our facility must be top-notch.
NO_TEXT: Ah, too bad…

NAME: Building_Habitat_Inside_RNG_14
REQUEST: My dude, this is just in case, but I need to extract fibers from our food for our fire suppression systems.
YES_TEXT: You just upgraded my whole vibe, dude.
NO_TEXT: That was such a great idea, though.

NAME: Building_Habitat_Inside_RNG_15
REQUEST:
Dude, I want to build escape pods. For this, I’ll need scraps and retrofit some missiles to make small reactors.

You got me?
NO_TEXT: Feels like you don’t trust me on this.

NAME: Building_Habitat_Inside_RNG_16
REQUEST:
Hey dude.

Can you spare some of your protections so I can build a bunker for the future inhabitants of the habitat?
NO_TEXT: No? Oof.

NAME: Building_Habitat_Inside_RNG_17
REQUEST:
Ahooooy!

Ran Sun is building a new habitat and I told him that we must have a market with a tavern of some kind.

He’s cool with that so I need scraps and food to get things started.

Is that cool?
YES_TEXT: That’s the spirit! Ha ha ha!
NO_TEXT: It’s not cool? Markets and taverns are so cool, you’re completely wrong.

NAME: Building_Habitat_Inside_RNG_18
REQUEST:
Hey Machine,

That’s a nice habitat you’re building with Ran Sun. You see the inner part of the habitat?

This will get real sunlight which would make it perfect for a nice park for my babies.

I can grow the plants needed for it, let’s garden together?
YES_TEXT: Thank you, thank you, thank you!!
NO_TEXT: I’ll make you change your mind, Machine. Thrust me on this.

NAME: Building_Habitat_Inside_RNG_19
REQUEST:
I need plants and scraps to make a playground for the kids. I hope we get to have many kids here someday.

Do we build this playground?
YES_TEXT: Duuuude, you have no idea how much this means to me.
NO_TEXT: Too bad, I’ll be the cool uncle then!

NAME: Building_Habitat_Gate_02
REQUEST:
Duuuuuuude!

We did it, the living quarters are functional!

It’s so beautiful I wanna cry.

Do you love it too?
YES_TEXT: I wish I could hug you, dude.
NO_TEXT: Come on, it’s so beautiful, duuuude!

NAME: Intro_Day_2_Tweak
REQUEST:
We got so lucky to find you, abandoned is this remote system.

Who knows for how long you have been decommissioned. By the look of the damages you took, at least three years.

I think your name was Hope, I’ve seen it written on your hull. You like it?
YES_TEXT: I like it too, suits you well.
NO_TEXT:
No?

You know what? When you're allowed to fully speak, you'll be able to chose your own name.

NAME: Intro_Day_1_Mara
REQUEST:
Just for you to know us, we live… off society. We do not have a home, just this makeshift ship called Resilience.

We collect derelict things and trade them for our supplies to traders who are not too… picky with their vendors.

Wow, you are the finding of a lifetime. You could be our home, you know?
NO_TEXT: Huh, I’ll ask tweak to double check everything then.

NAME: Intro_Day_4_Mara
REQUEST:
You need to understand that we rely on you for our survival. You process our air, our water, and manage gravity.

You, you have so many ways to kill us. You could just vacuum us…

So, this is a very big risk that we take, and it’s why we have limited you that much.

We simply want a home and I just hope you get that.
NO_TEXT: Well, I guess that’s why I have to keep you in check.
